headline: Lululemon Quality Issues And Leadership Gaps Test Brand And Valuation
summary: Lululemon Athletica (NasdaqGS:LULU) faces renewed product quality concerns as customers report see through issues with its Heart Scatter and Get Low leggings. The latest complaints follow an earlier controversy around similar issues with leggings, putting fresh attention on quality control and consumer trust. The company is currently without a CEO, while an activist investor is pushing for board changes, raising questions about leadership stability and governance. Lululemon Athletica, known...

headline: Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU) Faces Product Issues Amid Sales Struggles
summary: Lululemon Athletica Inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) is one of the high-growth, low P/E stocks to buy now. On February 12, Lululemon Athletica Inc. (NASDAQ: LULU) shares fell 2% after Bloomberg reported new complaints about its see-through leggings, the second such issue in recent weeks. Customers flagged problems with the “heart scatter” leggings on Reddit and the company’s […]
